mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_TABLE ( ORDER_NO, RECIPIENT_NAME, RECIPIENT_ZIPCODE, RECIPIENT_ADDR1, RECIPIENT_ADDR2, RECIPIENT_EXTRAADDR, REGDATE, TOTALPRICE, PAYMENT, MEMBER_ID, RECIPIENT_PHONE ) VALUES ( ORDER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RECIPIENT_NAME}, #{RECIPIENT_ZIPCODE}, #{RECIPIENT_ADDR1}, #{RECIPIENT_ADDR2}, #{RECIPIENT_EXTRAADDR}, SYSDATE, #{TOTALPRICE}, #{PAYMENT}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{RECIPIENT_PHONE} )
mapper.select: select ORDER_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL as ORDER_NO from dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL ( ORDER_DETAIL_NO, ORDER_NO, ATTRIBUTE_NO, ITEM_NO, COUNT ) VALUES ( ORDER_DETAIL_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ORDER_NO}, #{ATTRIBUTE_NO}, #{ITEM_NO}, #{COUNT} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, RECIPIENT_NAME, RECIPIENT_ZIPCODE, RECIPIENT_ADDR1, RECIPIENT_ADDR2, RECIPIENT_EXTRAADDR, REGDATE, TOTALPRICE, PAYMENT, MEMBER_ID, RECIPIENT_PHONE, STATE FROM ORDER_TABLE WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}

SELECT REGDATE, STATE, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_NO, COUNT, ITEM_NO, ATTRIBUTE_NO, NAME, PRICE, CONTENT, ITEM_SIZE FROM (SELECT a.REGDATE, a.STATE, a.MEMBER_ID, a.ORDER_NO, b.COUNT, b.ITEM_NO, b.ATTRIBUTE_NO, c.PRICE, c.CONTENT, c.NAME, d.ITEM_SIZE FROM ORDER_TABLE a, ORDER_DETAIL b, ITEM c, ITEM_ATTRIBUTE d WHERE a.ORDER_NO = b.ORDER_NO AND b.ITEM_NO = c.ITEM_NO AND b.ATTRIBUTE_NO=d.ATTRIBUTE_NO AND a.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND a.ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO} ORDER BY a.ORDER_NO desc) GROUP BY REGDATE, STATE, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_NO, COUNT, ITEM_NO, ATTRIBUTE_NO, NAME, PRICE, CONTENT, ITEM_SIZE
